metadata.title: CVE-2018-15909 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In Artifex Ghostscript 9.23 before 2018-08-24, a type confusion using the.shfill operator could be used by attackers able to supply craftedPostScript files to crash the interpreter or potentially execute code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-15909` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.22~dfsg+1-0ubuntu1.2
ghostscript-x - 9.22~dfsg+1-0ubuntu1.2
libgs9 - 9.22~dfsg+1-0ubuntu1.2
libgs9-common - 9.22~dfsg+1-0ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.22~dfsg+1-0ubuntu1.2').
